"The game consists of rounds at the beginning of which everyone is dealt one card. On her/his turn, a player is dealt a second card, then plays one of the two she/he has and resolves its effect. When the deck runs out or there is only one player left in play, the round ends and the player with the highest-valued card scores a point. Then all cards are shuffled, and the players who are knocked out return to the game and the steps described so far are repeated. To win the game, you need to score 8 points minus the number of players."
